name: Cubone
author: kawayoo
flavor_text: If it is sad or lonely, the skull it wears shakes and emits a plaintive and mournful sound.

poke_body.name: Lonely Bone
poke_body.effect: Any damage done to Cubone by your opponent’s attacks is reduced by 20 for each Marowak in your discard pile (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Bone Rush
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
